attributes.action: ban the use of hydrogenated vegetable fat (HVO) or trans fat in products sold in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The use of hydrogenated vegetable fat in edible products has been linked to Coronary heart disease, Cancer and many other life threatening illnesses. It use has already been banned in Denmark and Switzerland. 
Many food retailers have now considered removing products containing hydrogenated vegetable fat or trans fat from their own brand products but there are still many products that are freely avaliable in British supermarkets and shops that contain this deadly ingredient.
Help protect the health of the nation and say yes to banning hydrogenated vegetable fat in the United Kingdom.
